info.title: ApplicationInsightsManagementClient
info.description: Azure Application Insights client for favorites.

get.description: Gets a list of favorites defined within an Application Insights component.

200.description: A list containing 0 or more favorite definitions associated to the Application Insights component.

get.description: Gets a list of favorites defined within an Application Insights component.

200.description: A list containing 0 or more favorite definitions associated to the Application Insights component.

ApplicationInsightsComponentFavorite.description: A list of Favorites defined for an Application Insights Component.

Name.description: The user-defined name of the favorite.

Config.description: Configuration of this particular favorite, which are driven by the Azure portal UX. Configuration data is a string containing valid JSON

Version.description: This instance's version of the data model. This can change as new features are added that can be marked favorite. Current examples include MetricsExplorer (ME) and Search.

FavoriteId.description: Internally assigned unique id of the favorite definition.

FavoriteType.description: Enum indicating if this favorite definition is owned by a specific user or is shared between all users with access to the Application Insights component.

SourceType.description: The source of the favorite definition.

TimeModified.description: Date and time in UTC of the last modification that was made to this favorite definition.

Tags.description: A list of 0 or more tags that are associated with this favorite definition

Category.description: Favorite category, as defined by the user at creation time.

IsGeneratedFromTemplate.description: Flag denoting wether or not this favorite was generated from a template.

UserId.description: Unique user id of the specific user that owns this favorite.

ResourceGroupNameParameter.name: resourceGroupName
ResourceGroupNameParameter.description: The name of the resource group.

ResourceNameParameter.name: resourceName
ResourceNameParameter.description: The name of the Application Insights component resource.

FavoriteTypeParameter.name: favoriteType
FavoriteTypeParameter.description: The type of favorite. Value can be either Shared or User.

FavoriteIdParameter.name: favoriteId
FavoriteIdParameter.description: The Id of a specific favorite defined in the Application Insights component
